vote.title: You can vote, review or rate {{&username}} on these sites:

auth.start: Authorize your Trello account with your Discord here:

donate.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied any donation links!

links.github: Here is the link to my source code:

invite.start: Here are the links to invite me to other servers!
invite.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied any invite links!

serverinvite.start: Join the support server with any of these links!
serverinvite.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied any support server links!

help.header:
{{&username}} (Running Modified [Faux](https://github.com/Snazzah/Faux?ref=tacobot) By Snazzah)
Support Server: {{&link}}

Don't know where to start? [Click Here!](https://tacobot.app/guide?ref=bot)
Like Taco? Support us via [Patreon](https://patreon.com/trello_talk) or by voting. (`T!vote`)

info.title: Information about {{&username}}
info.faux: This bot is using a modified version of [Faux](https://github.com/Snazzah/Faux?ref=tacobot).

locale.choose: Type the number of the locale you want to set to.
locale.header: `{{&prefix}}locale setuser [locale]` or `{{&prefix}}locale setserver [locale]` to set locale.
locale.no_guild: You are not running the command in a guild!

trello.self_join: Allow Team Members to Edit and Join

webhook_cmd.header: Use `{{&cleanPrefix}}webhook <webhookID>` to view a webhook and `{{&cleanPrefix}}editwebhook <webhookID>` to edit it.
webhook_cmd.none: There are no webhooks on this server connected to Trello.
webhook_cmd.dwh_missing: The Discord webhook connected to this webhook is missing!
webhook_cmd.twh_missing: The user who setup the webhook is missing, this may stop the webhook from sending!
webhook_cmd.try_repair: You can repair this issue with `{{&cleanPrefix}}editwebhook {{&id}} repair`
webhook_cmd.add_header: How would you want your webhook to be set up?

default.name: Default
default.description: Regular messages, showing as much information as possible

small.name: Small
small.description: Small version of default webhooks, only showing the descriptive title

compact.name: Compact
compact.description: Stacks multiple events into one embed, much like GitHub webhook commits

webhook_cmd.no_channels: No channels have been found that allows me to manage webhooks.
webhook_cmd.choose_channel: Choose which channel that the webhook will post in.
webhook_cmd.couldnt_create: I could not create the webhook! This is probably due to some sudden permission change in the process!
webhook_cmd.create_confirm: This webhook for the Trello board "{{&name}}" has started! Actions should be showing up shortly‚Ä¶
webhook_cmd.no_dwh: You have no Discord webhooks to link to!
webhook_cmd.input_link: Paste the link of the webhook you want to use.
webhook_cmd.no_link: I couldn't find a webhook URL in the input!
webhook_cmd.no_server_link: That webhook is not on this server!
webhook_cmd.wywtd: Choose what you want to do with this webhook.
webhook_cmd.wh_off: The webhook has been turned off.
webhook_cmd.wh_on: The webhook has been turned on.
webhook_cmd.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook?
webhook_cmd.repair_dwh_header: The Discord webhook is missing. How do you want to create a new one?
webhook_cmd.repaired: Any issues with the webhook have been repaired.
webhook_cmd.choose_lists: Choose which lists will be filtered. Choosing no lists will disable list filtering.
webhook_cmd.choose_cards: Choose which cards will be filtered. Choosing no cards will disable card filtering.
webhook_cmd.no_access: Either this board no longer exists or you do not have access to it!
webhook_cmd.choose_style: Type the number of the style you want to set the webhook to.
webhook_cmd.max_wh: You have reached your maximum webhooks for this server! You can increase this limit by becoming a patreon! (`{{&cleanPrefix}}donate`)
webhook_cmd.wh_expire: This webhook is unavailable since it exceeds your current webhook limit! You can increase this limit by becoming a patreon! (`{{&cleanPrefix}}donate`)

cooldown_msg: This command needs to cool down! *({{seconds}})*
deprecated: This command is no longer available!

command_permissions.attach: I need the permission `Attach Files` to use this command!
command_permissions.embed: I need the permission `Embed Links` to use this command!
command_permissions.emoji: I need the permission `Use External Emojis` to use this command!
command_permissions.trelloRole: This command requires you to be the server owner or have a role named `Trello`!
command_permissions.elevated: Only the elevated users of the bot can use this command!
command_permissions.auth:
You haven't authorized your Trello account with Discord!
Authorize with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}auth` command!
command_permissions.selectedBoard:
There is no board selected!
Select a board with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}switch` command!
command_permissions.discordAuth:
You haven't authorized your Trello account with Discord!
Authorize with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}auth` command!
command_permissions.webhooks: I need the permission `Manage Webhooks` to use this command! **This permission must be enabled on a role rather than a channel!**
command_permissions.userData: Your settings are not in the database!
command_permissions.guild: This command must be ran in a guild!

auth.description: Get the auth link to connect your Discord account to your Trello account.

donate.description: Get the donation links for the developer.

github.description: Sends the bot's open source link.

serverinvite.description: Get the invite for the support server.

asynceval.note:
Due to the added async IIFE wrapper in this command, it is necessary to use the return statement to return a result.
e.g. `{{&cleanPrefix}}aeval return 1`

help.description: Shows the help message and gives information on commands.

locale.description: Lets you set the locale for you or the server. Run with no arguments for a list of locales.

prefix.description: Lets you set the prefixes for you or the server.

shardinfo.description: Gives the stats for every shard.

me.description: View information about your Trello account.

switch.description: Selects a board to use for other commands. Use the `{{&cleanPrefix}}boards` command to see what boards you can select.

boards.description: Lists all of the boards you can manage.

board.description: Gets information on the current board.

lists.description: Lists all of the open lists on the current board. You can see the list archive with `{{&cleanPrefix}}listarchive`.

list.description: Lists all cards in that list.

listarchive.description: Lists all the archived lists in the current board.

card.description: Gets information about a specific card.

cardarchive.description: Lists all the archived cards in the current board.

labels.description: Lists all of the labels on the current board.

label.description: Shows information on a label on the current board.

editlabel.description: Edit a label's properties. Check the note for sub-commands and usages.
editlabel.note:
`name [newName]` - Rename the label
`color [newColor]` - Changes the label's color

watchcard.description: Toggle watching a card. Watched cards will give you update notifications on [Trello](https://trello.com/).

watchlist.description: Toggle watching a list. Watched lists will give you update notifications on [Trello](https://trello.com/).

watch.description: Toggle watching a board. If no board is defined, the current board is used. Watched boards will give you update notifications on [Trello](https://trello.com/).

star.description: Toggles starring a board. If no board is defined, the current board is used. Starred boards will show up at the top of your boards list on [Trello](https://trello.com/).

editlist.description: Edit a list's properties. Check the note for sub-commands and usages.
editlist.note:
`name [newName]` - Rename the list
`archive`, `unarchive` - Toggles the list archive

editcard.description: Edit a card's properties. Check the note for sub-commands and usages.
editcard.note:
`name [newName]` - Rename the card
`archive`, `unarchive` - Toggles the card archive
`desc [newDescription]` - Sets the card's description
`removedesc` - Removes the card's description
`label` - Manage card labels
`members` - Manage card members
`move`, `mv` - Moves the card to another list
`due` - Set the card due date
`duedone` - Toggles the card due date's completion
`removedue` - Removes the card's due date
`attach` - Creates an attachment on the card
`attachments`, `atch` - Manage attachments

editboard.description: Edit the current board's properties. Check the note for sub-commands and usages.
editboard.note:
`name [newName]` - Rename the board (board admin)
`archive`, `unarchive` - Toggles the board archive (board admin)
`desc [newDescription]` - Sets the board's description
`removedesc` - Removes the board's description
`commentperms` - Change commenting permissions (board admin)
`voteperms` - Change voting permissions (board admin)
`inviteperms` - Change invitation permissions (board admin)

attachment.description: Shows an attachment that is on a card.

addlist.description: Creates a list on the current board.

addlabel.description: Creates a label on the current board.

comment.description: Comment on a card in the current board.

webhooks.description: Lists the webhooks on your server.

webhook.description: Get information about a specific webhook.

addwebhook.description: Creates a webhook on your server.

editwebhook.description: Edits a webhook on your server.  Check the note for sub-commands and usages.
editwebhook.note:
`activate`, `deactivate` - Activates or deactivates the webhook
`filters` - Edit the filters (formerly "Webhook Bits") for this webhook
`locale [locale]` - Sets the locale for the webhook
`repair` - Repairs any issues with the webhook
`delete` - Deletes the webhook
`policy` - Changes the filter policy of the webhook (whitelist/blacklist)
`style` - Change the style of the webhook
`lists` - Edit filtered lists
`cards` - Edit filtered cards

remwebhook.description: Removes a webhook from your server.

clearauth.description: Clears your Trello authorization. Do not run this unless you really need to.

cleardata.description: Removes your user data from Taco.

setmaxwebhooks.description: Sets the limit of webhooks for that server.

vote.description: Shows the links to vote for Taco on.

error: An error occurred while processing that command!

trello_response.unauthorized: The last token used has been invalidated or revoked! Reauthorize with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}auth` command!
trello_response.ratelimit: Too many requests are being sent! Try again later!
trello_response.internal: An internal server error has occurred on Trello's end! Try again later!
trello_response.aborted: Trello took too long to send a response! Try again later!

prompt.choose: Type the number of the item you want to use.
prompt.input: Type the message you want to input.
prompt.timeout: Your last prompt was timed out.
prompt.no_search: No results came up with that search.
prompt.confirm: Are you sure you want to do this?
prompt.cancel_confirm: Type `yes` to confirm. Any other message will cancel the confirmation.
prompt.select: Type the number of the item to toggle its value.
prompt.async_select: Type the number of the item to toggle its value. **Changes will be made when a value is toggled.**
prompt.select_cancel: Type "save" to save the selection, otherwise type "cancel" to exit.
prompt.select_canceled: Your last prompt was canceled. All changes have been lost.
prompt.select_timeout: Your last prompt was timed out. All changes have been lost.

menu.cover: Set this attachment as the card cover

cards.arch_none: This board has no archived cards.
cards.arch_header: Use `{{&cleanPrefix}}editcard <listID|listName> unarchive` to open a card.
cards.error: I could not get the card's data! Unless someone deleted before the request, this might be an error on Trello's end!

cards.input_name: Type the name you want to rename the card to.
cards.input_desc: Type the new description for the card.
cards.input_new: Type the name of the card that you want to add.
cards.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{&name}}"? (`{{id}}`)
cards.removed_due: Removed the due date for card "{{&name}}".
cards.due_on: Marked due date as complete for card "{{&name}}".
cards.due_off: Marked due date as incomplete for card "{{&name}}".
cards.input_comment: Type the message you want to comment on the card.
cards.same_list_move: This card is already in this list!
cards.input_due: Type the due date to set the card on.
cards.bad_due: I could not recognize that date. Try something like "Tomorrow at 9 AM" or "Next Friday".
cards.input_attach: Paste the URL of the attachment you want to add to the card. You can also add an attachment to your message.

lists.arch_none: This board has no archived lists.
lists.arch_header: Use `{{&cleanPrefix}}editlist <listID|listName> unarchive` to open a list.
lists.list_header: Use `{{&cleanPrefix}}card <cardID|cardName>` to get information on a card.

lists.wywtd: Choose what you want to do with this list.
lists.input_name: Type the name you want to rename the list to.
lists.input_new: Type the name of the list that you want to add.

labels.choose: Type the number of the label you want to use.
labels.wywtd: Choose what you want to do with this label.
labels.input_name: Type the name you want to rename the label to.
labels.choose_color: Type the number of the color you want to set the label to.
labels.remove_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete "{{&name}}"? (`{{id}}`)
**This removes the entire label, not just from one card.**
labels.input_new: Type the name of the label that you want to add.

can_add.zero: You can't add any more prefixes.

prefix.no_arg_server: Provide the prefix you want to set to the server!
prefix.no_arg: Provide the prefix you want to add!
prefix.footer: Prefixes with the üîí icon cannot be removed.

prefix.char_limit: Prefixes can not be more than 32 characters!

user_mgmt.star_error: The board's star was not found! Try again later!
user_mgmt.clearauth_confirm:
Are you sure you want to clear your authorization? The following will happen:
- Your Trello token will be invalidated.
- Any webhooks you created will no longer work and will be required to be repaired.
user_mgmt.cleardata_confirm:
Are you sure you want to remove your data? The following will happen:
- Your prefixes and locale settings will be removed.
- Your authorization credentials will be removed.
- Your Trello token will be invalidated.
- Any webhooks you created will no longer work and will be required to be repaired.
user_mgmt.cleardata: Your user data has been cleared.

webhooks.move_card_in_list: {{&member}} moved "{{&card}}" to a different position in the list
webhooks.due_off: {{&member}} marked due date as incomplete on card "{{&card}}"
webhooks.due_change: {{&member}} changed the due date on card "{{&card}}"
webhooks.due_add: {{&member}} added a due date on card "{{&card}}"
webhooks.due_remove: {{&member}} removed the due date from card "{{&card}}"
webhooks.checkitem_tocard: {{&member}} converted checklist item "{{&card}}" into a card
webhooks.checkitem_move: {{&member}} moved a checklist item in "{{&card}}" to a different position
webhooks.checkitem_rename: {{&member}} renamed a checklist item in card "{{&card}}"
webhooks.checklist_move: {{&member}} moved a checklist in "{{&card}}" to a different position
webhooks.list_move: {{&member}} moved list "{{&list}}" to a different position
webhooks.board_to_admin: {{&member}} made {{&member2}} an admin of the board
webhooks.board_to_normal: {{&member}} made {{&member2}} a regular member of the board
webhooks.board_to_normal_self: {{&member}} made themselves a regular member of the board
webhooks.add_board_desc: {{&member}} added a description to the board
webhooks.edit_board_desc: {{&member}} changed the description of the board
webhooks.rem_board_desc: {{&member}} removed the description from the board
webhooks.customfield_carddisplay_true: {{&member}} turned on card display for custom field "{{&customField}}"
webhooks.customfield_carddisplay_false: {{&member}} turned off card display for custom field "{{&customField}}"

webhook_filters.MAKE_NORMAL_MEMBER_OF_BOARD: Board admins demoted to normal member
webhook_filters.MOVE_CARD_FROM_BOARD: Card transfers out of the board
webhook_filters.MOVE_LIST_FROM_BOARD: List transfers out of the board
